document.masterDocTitle: New taxonomic and faunistic data to species of the genus Laena Dejean from Turkey (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae, Lagriinae), with descriptions of two new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New taxonomic and faunistic data to species of the genus Laena Dejean from Turkey (Coleoptera, Tenebrionidae, Lagriinae), with descriptions of two new species

mods:name.mods:affiliation: Staatliches Museum für Naturkunde, Rosenstein 1, 70191 Stuttgart, Germany. & Contributions to Tenebrionidae no. 161. For no. 160 see: Annals of the Ditsong Museum of Natural History Pretoria 9, 2020

bibRefCitation.author: Weise, J.
bibRefCitation.refString: Weise, J. (1878) Beitrag zur Kenntnis der Gattung Laena Latreille. Verhandlungen des naturforschenden Vereines in Brunn, 16, 227 - 241.

Remarks: This species was described from the Caucasus and so far unknown from Turkey .However, the collected specimens in the Black Sea range completely coincide with available specimens from adjacent southwestern Caucasus, also in the shape of the aedeagus( Figs.44,45 ).This distributional pattern in Pontus and Caucasus fits also under zoogeographicalaspects.
L.graeca
alsofromnorthernTurkeyissomewhatsimilar,buttheaedeagusisdistinctlydifferent( Fig.42 ). Published locality: Zirkassia (Caucasus) ( Schuster 1916 ).
